Recommendations: More educational, occupational and social information may be provided to students
Additional guidance counselors may be designated from among the faculty members to  cater to the needs of the students
Evaluation of allco-curricular and extra-curricular activities needs to be done to determine the strengths and weaknesses of the program.
Documents filed in each folder need to be labeled properly.
Pictures of students activities may be labeled properly indicating the name of the activity, date, and the person involves in the activity.
